content:
Sure, here's a table summarizing the differences between the Genesis GV70 and GV80:

| Feature | GV70 | GV80 |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Size | Compact SUV | Midsize SUV |
| Interior Space | Less spacious | More spacious |
| Powertrain Options | 2.5L turbo four-cylinder engine (standard) | 2.5L turbo four-cylinder engine (standard), 3.5L twin-turbo V6 engine (available) |
| Available Features | 360-degree surround-view monitor not available, 12.3-inch 3D digital instrument cluster not available, 21-speaker Lexicon premium audio system not available | 360-degree surround-view monitor available, 12.3-inch 3D digital instrument cluster available, 21-speaker Lexicon premium audio system available |
| Price | Lower-priced SUV | Higher-priced SUV |

It's worth noting that availability, pricing, and features may vary depending on the model year and region. Be sure to check with your local Genesis dealer for the most up-to-date information.
